item.title: Get Mock Image With Custom Size And Text
item.description: How to get mock image with custom size and text Question To show how adaptive frontend behaves I needed to create current frontend cards layout with numbered images Answer https://via.placeholder.com/1280x800.png?text=1 Where text could be anything you want and 1280x800 as you might have guessed is image size
